column1: good length outside off, onto the backfoot and does a solid defense first up
good length outside off, lets it through to the keeper, a hint of away swing
drifting onto the pads, flicks it down to fine leg for a run
good length on middle, onto the backfoot and does a defense
good length on middle stump, onto the backfoot again and pushes it back to the bowler
full and straight, driven straight back towards the bowler and he manages to get a hand to it and slows it down as mid-on across to field it
quick outside off, looks to cut but not cleanly and it rolls to point fielder
tossed on middle, onto the frontfoot and gets right behind it to defend it
floated on the pads, lets it spin and nudges it to short square leg for a quick run
flighted on middle, onto the frontfoot carefully and does a defense
quicker on middle, goes for a defense but gets a inside edge to the short fine leg fielder, lucky him to not have that go onto the stumps
tossed on middle onto the frontfoot and does a defense
good length on the pads, pushes it past short mid-wicket for a couple as it is chased down before the boundary rope
onto the backfoot and does a defense back to the bowler
good length on middle, onto the backfoot and pushes it to mid-on nicely as it kept a bit low
full outside off, drives it on the rise to the left of cover who dives and gets a hand to it, a bit of confusion in between but the get across for a quick single
good length on middle, onto the frontfoot and drives it uppishly but safe on the bounce to mid-on
good length on middle, comes down the track and lofts it high and away from mid-on, didn't get it cleanly and gets just a couple for it
tossed on pads, nudges it fine but to the short fien leg fielder
tossed on middle, onto the frontfoot and does a defense
flighted outside off, sees the flight and opens his arms to loft it high and couples of bounce into the boundary at covers
onto the frontfoot and does a defense back to the bowler
quicker on middle, onto the backfoot and pushes it back to the bowler
quicker outside off, onto the backfoot and pushes it towards covers, fielder at covers dives and makes a good stop but they get through for a run
good lenght outside off, onto the backfoot and pushes it to cover point. no run there
good length outside off, looks to pull it towards mid-wicket but gets a top edge in the air, bowler calls for it and gets under it nicely to take an easy catch
good length on middle to the new batsman, onto the frontfoot and does a good defense back to the bowler
good lenght on off, pushes it carefully ont the frontfoot to the cover fielder
short on the pads, nudges it but to the short square leg fielder
full on off, drives it on the rise but to the short cover fielder, a successfull over comes to an end
tossed on middle-leg, nudges it to the on-side but to the fielder
tossed outside off, comes down the pitch and slaps it over covers for a huge six
flighted on middle, onto the frontfoot and does a defense
tossed on middle, onto the frontfoot and pushes it to mid-off
tossed on middle-leg, pushes it of the frontfoot down to mid-on for a run
tossed up, comes down and flicks it uppishly but away from the short mid-wicket fielder for a run
good length on midlde, onto the frontfoot and does a defensive push to mid-on
fuller length on leg, pushes it nicely but to the short catching fielder on the on-side just to the side of the pitch
full on middle, driven nicely along the ground to mid-off
short aimed into the batsman, comes down to drag it towards mid-wicket but misses it, a small shout for caught behind but not-out is the call
full on leg, pushes it to mid-on
good lenght just outside off, onto the frontfoot and pushes it to cover fielder
good lenght outside off, looks to drive but gets a outside edge and away from the first slip fielder down to thirdman for a run
full outside off, onto the frontfoot and drives it to short cover fielder
good length into the pads, pushes it nicely on the frontfoot but to the short mid-wicket fielder
full outside off, goes for a drive but gets a thick outside edge and away from the in coming point fielder down to thirdman for a run
good lenght outside off, goes for a backfoot push but edges it to the keeper for a soft dismissal
good length on off, gets some extra bounce out of the pitch, batsman nicely under it and blocks it
good lenght outside off, onto the frontfoot and pushes it to point
good length on middle-leg, takes a step down to pushes it to deep sqaure leg for a run
onto the backfoot and tries to push it towards square leg but doesn't get much on it
good lenght on middle, onto the backfoot and does a defense nicely, kept a bit low again
onto the pads, pushes  it with soft hands to mid-on for a quick run
good lenght on middle, pushes it of the backfoot towards square leg but fielder across from short mid-wicket to field it
short down the leg, lets it through to the keeper and wide given
good length outside off, onto the frontfoot and pushes it to point
outside off, onto the backfoot to punch it into covers but misses it completely, no foot movement at all
good length outside off, onto the backfoot and pushes it to cover fielder
short outside off, onto the backfoot early and punches it past point and gully for a boundary away from the thirdman fielder
good length on off, pushes it to point of the frontfoot
good length on the pads, flicks it nicely to short mid-wicket as it kept low again
fuller outside off, looks to drive  it to covers but gets  the inside half of the bat and goes to short mid-wicket
outside off, looks to cut it past point but gets a inside edge and just away from the stumps, non-striker calls for a run and they get across quickly as well
fuller outside off, drives it firmly to the right of mid-off and they get across for a quick run, throw was direct at the stumps but batsman was safely home
outside off, guides it of the backfoot down to thirdman for a run

outside off, onto the backfoot and pushes it to point
